name: Ecstasy
description:
Walt Reunamo, DREAM SERIES #14, Digital Art, 2021. Personal use only. 

"Ecstasy" explores to visualize the event of orgasm in colorful way. The mellow spaced out feeling and the relaxation. This is the very first video artwork for the DREAM SERIES.
 
The original digital painting of this artwork will be part of the #Hardcover3 artbook.
https://www.artbook-news.com/about-hardcover

"Hardcover is publishing explicit artwork created by established professionals who believe in the freedom to explore our sexuality and humanity through art.

Hardcover books are compilation of explicit sexual art by hundreds of artists who take a stand against the the aggressive rejection of any nude artwork (and specifically the female nipples) on social media. It has influenced creators to the extent that many artists now avoid working with nudity altogether. Posted uncensored, their work has led to blocked profiles, deleted images, and platform bans, creating an industry-stigma around the subject that artists are now cautioned to avoid."

The original digital painting will be later also part of the DREAM SERIES, which is upcoming artbook from Walt Reunamo that explores ethereal landscapes and spaces of dreams, illustrated with vibrant figurative paintings.
